00058           function decode($command){
00059                     
00060                     $cmd=$this->splitdecoded($command);
00061                     
00062                     // if cmd exists...
00063                     if(isset($this->conf[$cmd[0]])){
00064 
00065                               $set=$this->conf[$cmd[0]];
00066                               
00067                               $ncmd=array();
00068                               $ncmd['class']=$set['class'];
00069                               $ncmd['action']=$set['action'];
00070                               
00071                               // Params 1
00072                               $params=explode(',',$set['params'][0]);
00073                               $x=1;
00074                               $param1=array();
00075                               foreach($params as $param){
00076                                         
00077                                         // many
00078                                         if(substr($param,0,1)=='{'){
00079                                                   //if it's not an array...
00080                                                   if(!is_array($cmd[$x])){
00081                                                             $cmd[$x]=array($cmd[$x]);
00082                                                   }
00083                                                   $par=substr($param,1,-1);
00084                                         
00085                                         // optional
00086                                         }else if(substr($param,0,1)=='['){
00087                                                   //if it's an array...
00088                                                   if(is_array($cmd[$x])){
00089                                                             $cmd[$x]='';
00090                                                   }
00091                                                   $par=substr($param,1,-1);
00092                                         
00093                                                   // must
00094                                         }else{
00095                                                   $par=$param;
00096                                                   //if it's an array...
00097                                                   if(is_array($cmd[$x])){
00098                                                             $cmd[$x]=implode(',',$cmd[$x]);
00099                                                   }
00100                                         }
00101                                         // save param to param1
00102                                         $param1[$par]=$cmd[$x];
00103                                         $x++;
00104                               }
00105                               $ncmd['params'][]=$param1;
00106                               
00107                               // add rest of params...
00108                               $x=0;
00109                               foreach($set['params'] as $param){
00110                                         if($x!=0){
00111                                                   $ncmd['params'][]=$param;
00112                                         }else{
00113                                                   $x=1;
00114                                         }
00115                               }
00116                               return array(null,$ncmd);
00117                     }else{
00118                               return array(zerror::err('fail: false command)',$this->conf[$cmd],zerror::notcritical),null);
00119                     }
00120           }
00121 
00129           function splitdecoded($cmd){
00130                     // split decoded... , => yes, #, => no
00131                     // then: [## => #][#, =>,][#: => :]
00132                     preg_match_all('/,((?:[^#,]|#.)*)/',','.$cmd,$splits,PREG_PATTERN_ORDER);
00133                     
00134                     $rep=array(
00135                               array('#,','##','#:'),
00136                               array(',','#',':')
00137                     );
00138                     
00139                     $cmds=array();
00140                     
00141                     // every , seperator
00142                     foreach($splits[1] as $split){
00143                               // split decoded... : => yes, #: => no
00144                               preg_match_all('/:((?:[^#:]|#.)*)/',':'.$split,$splits2,PREG_PATTERN_ORDER);
00145                               
00146                               // everey : separator..
00147                               // if ":" found process values...
00148                               if(count($splits2[1])>1){
00149                                         $cmds2=array();
00150                                         foreach($splits2[1] as $split2){
00151                                                   $cmds2[]=str_replace($rep[0],$rep[1],$split2);
00152                                         }
00153                                         $cmds[]=$cmds2;
00154                               //else add value
00155                               }else{
00156                                         $cmds[]=str_replace($rep[0],$rep[1],$split);
00157                               }
00158                     }
00159                     return $cmds;
00160           }

00168           function getemail($email){
00169                     if(strpos($email,'@')===false){
00170                               $email=$email.'@'.$this->domain;
00171                     }
00172                               
00173                     return $this->cleanmail($email);
00174           }
00175           
00176           function cleanval($value){
00177                     return trim($value);
00178           }
00179           function cleanmail($value){
00180                     $rep=array(array('ä','ö','ü'),array('ae','oe','ue'));
00181                     return str_replace($rep[0],$rep[1],$value);
00182           }
00183           
00184           function checkmail($value){
00185                     $email = preg_match("/[\.a-z0-9_-]+@[a-z0-9-]{2,}\.[a-z]{2,4}$/i",$value);
00186                     return ($email!==false &&$value!='')?true:false;
00187           }
